thread.title: FIFA refuse to take action against England fans over their chanting towards German supporters
thread.title_full: FIFA refuse to take action against England fans over their chanting towards German supporters

author: John Cross
title: FIFA refuse to take action against England fans over their chanting towards German supporters
text:
Sport FIFA refuse to take action against England fans over their chanting towards German supporters The friendly encounter in Dortmund was marred by a section of the England fans singing distasteful songs referencing the two World Wars Share England fans watch on - there is no suggestion those in the image were involved (Photo: REUTERS) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
FIFA will impose no sanctions against England fans despite their actions during the friendly against Germany which saw them sing songs about the Second World War and booing the German national anthem. 
The Football Association feared they would be in hot water and Chairman Greg Clarke branded the section of fans who chanted the songs as "disrespectul". 
But the World's football governing body has revealed they will not be taking the matter any further. 
Football Association chiefs are still promising to review footage of the supporters and have pledged to issue banning orders against those found guilty. 
Clarke stepped away from the usual diplomatic line to issue a strong statement against a section of the travelling fans who sang about the Second World War and booed the German national anthem ahead of Wednesday night's friendly in Dortmund. FA Chairman condemns England fans (Photo: Jordan Mansfield) 
He said: “The behaviour of a section of the England support in Dortmund was inappropriate, disrespectful and disappointing.” 
The taunts from fans came on the day when London was hit by a terror attack and could be heard by the live eight million TV audience on ITV. 
Clarke added: “The FA has consistently urged supporters to show respect and not to chant songs that could be regarded as insulting to others. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
